snippet: In his new horror spoof, a bachelor pad gets crowded.
abstract: Marlon Wayans, who co-wrote horror spoof movie A Haunted House, discusses his views on relationships and race that inform plot of film.
lead_paragraph: In his new horror spoof, a bachelor pad gets crowded.

headline.seo: Marlon Wayans on His Horror Spoof, ‘A Haunted House’
headline.main: If Marlon Wayans Asks You to His House, Think Twice
headline.print_headline: If Marlon Wayans Asks You to His House, Think Twice
